name: Country Inn & Suites Covington

reviews.title: Very nice room!
reviews.text: Young lady at front desk was extremely accommodating. Room were spotless and well appointed. Great beds allowed for a comfortable night. Breakfast hostess was very helpful. Thanks County Inns!

reviews.title: The dog that doesn't exist!
reviews.text: Hotel was fine over all but they leave you with a nasty taste in your mouth. After I checked out of the room I was told I had a dog in my room and was charged a 200 pet fee. I NEVER had a dog in my room and have only been sent a photo of a stain that was in the room when I got there. The staff are very unprofessional in handling the mess, they say they will return phone calls and don't ,claim they are the manager and they aren't and their story keeps changing. We wish they would just listen to REASON! Please do NOT support this hotel. And just in case you take the chance please make sure you leave your room clean or you might be charged as being as filthy as animals!

reviews.title: Great Hotel
reviews.text: This is a great hotel with a fabulous and caring staff. The rooms and suites are super clean. The beds are very comfortable with awesome pillows. Breakfast is provided every morning with a variety of choices. During the week wine and snacks are served which enables you to visit with the other guests if you care. Overall, it is a great experience!

reviews.title: No Surprises!
reviews.text: We would never stay anywhere else while in the New Orleans area.

reviews.title: Southern Hospitality
reviews.text: I'm not sure this review will add too much to what has already been said, but let me confirm that there were no surprises waiting for us here. It was great being able to check-in early and grab a fresh baked cookie in the process. The inn and rooms were spotless without exception, including the manicured grounds in an otherwise uninviting yet convenient location.

We were a group of 9 traveling in an RV heading towards New Orleans for a Cruise. We were calling hotels in cities nearby. We found the phone call here to be very helpful, but that was just the beginning. Check in was quick and friendly. The clerk answered all our questions and lead us to a wonderful place to eat. We found the rooms to be large, clean and very comfortable. What a great value. Highly recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Wonderful surprise

reviews.text: We stayed two nights here. It was exceptionally clean and well staffed. It had amenities we did not take advantage of like the exercise room and the internet but I checked them out for future use and they all were clean and worked well. The breakfast was fine, nothing spectacular, but if I wanted that I would have gone out to eat. It had all the basics and it was tasty and very clean. The staff was especially friendly and helpful. I strongly recommend it to everyone. I will be staying there again on my next trip.
reviews.title: The Best Place to Stay in the Area

reviews.text: This place was wonderful from the immediate welcome with fresh cookies and ice cold milk. The bed was fine..just could have used a few more pillows. I'm sure they would have provided them if I would have asked. The exercise room has one elliptical, two treadmills, and one all-in-one weight machine. The breakfast was good for someone that loves carbs. They had everything except eggs the morning we were there. You can definitely find something to eat. I'm really picky but my husband liked it alot. I would recommend this place to everyone. Outstanding in every aspect which is unheard of these days.
reviews.title: Stay here!!!!!

reviews.text: We could not ask for any better staff. Cathy at the front desk made such an impression in my children with her kind words. The room, pool, & breakfast area were clean and comfortable. We were very pleased with our trip. The inn was close to several restaurants as well which made it very convenient.
reviews.title: True southern hospitality at a reasonable rate, not to far from NO.

reviews.text: The staff was extremely helpful with the reservation process and made my group check in simple as "pie." They treated us so well. The rooms were clean along with the entire property. I highly recommend this place to stay when in the New Orleans metro area.
reviews.title: Nice property and friendly staff
Great hotel / Great location
reviews.text: We found this hotel to be a great choice due to it being new and very clean. It's just away enough from the street traffic to be very quiet and restful. The lobby was designed to feel homey and succeeded, with evening snacks and diverse breakfast choices (great waffles). Hotel staff was pleasant and helpful and check in-out was a breeze. We loved the location, which was was near all of the great dining and shopping areas. We went as a get away, as Covington and Mandeville are really nice for that purpose.

reviews.title: Friendly and Comfortable
reviews.text: We have stayed here twice now and have been very pleased each time. The rooms are spacious - we would like to see a "guest chair" added in addition to the desk chair. You really need something to sit and watch TV in if you are staying for more than an overnight. Lisa, who works the breakfast area in the mornings, is great! Always smiling and friendly to help start your day off right. The cookies at the front desk are hard to come by. Made several trips downstairs and checked every time we went in and out and only had cookies available about 10% of the time. How are we supposed to have our bedtime snacks?? (LOL) The pool and spa are well maintained. Easy access to Walmart and a variety of restaurants. Steer clear of the nearby Waffle House - it is a bad Twilight Zone experience - and we generally enjoy Waffle Houses.

reviews.title: Best Employee You Have is Kathi
reviews.text: She has always showed professionalism in dealing with the public, espicially children and senior people. The years at BellSouth did her well. It was a pleasure staying at your hotel while waiting to occupy my home in Mandeville.

reviews.title: Quiet and comfortable
reviews.text: Best of luck.

reviews.title: Our stay in Covington, LA at Country Inn & Suites Impact
reviews.text: RAA

this hotel is very nice,comfortable. my husband, kids and i love going louisiana for the marigrass this is our 3rd yr going. and we stay at the county inn & suites 2 times already in covington love the breakfast they serve,staff very friendly,rooms nice and clean the price was just right we want to thank all the staff fot a great job and all the housekeepers and cook keep up the good work we see yall again in 2013. thank you
reviews.title: great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We escaped for the weekend and stayed in Covington and attended some of the attractions near there. We stayed at Country Inn & Suites and were not disappointed. Our room was very clean, the bed was comfy, had a mini fridge and nice bath items and the price was right. Breakfast was your typical for a hotel, but very good and not overcrowded. The staff were very accommodating and nice. We really enjoyed our stay here and will stay there again next time we escape to Covington.
reviews.title: Very Nice and Comfortable

reviews.text: What a treat! Cocktail party in lounge and excellent service at check-in exceeded expectations. Member of exclusive spa with member rates a bonus. I definitely plan on booking again and soon.
reviews.title: Resort Feel
Wonderful hotel
reviews.text: One of the best values we have found anywhere. New, clean rooms. Low price. Great breakfast included. Free cookies. Friendly staff. this is our new stop when driving across I-10 / I-12.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is easy to find, just off I-12 in Covintion, LA.
reviews.title: Comfortable, Clean, & Convenient

description: Country Inn & Suites of Covington/Mandeville offers a convenient location off of I-12 (exit 63B), on the North Shore of New Orleans. Country Inn & Suites has been awarded the President’s award for excellence (top 10 Carlson hotel world wide). Hotel is near the heart of the Covington business district, and close to numerous attractions such as Global Wildlife, Pelican Park, Tammany Trace, Fountainebleau State Park, and the famous French Quarter; the perfect choice for the business and leisure traveler. We are in close proximity to Chevron, LLOG and Shell Training Center. Country Inn is surrounded by unlimited great food choices. Hotel offers 70 spacious non-smoking rooms and suites, with all the little extras to make your stay enjoyable. At check-in you’ll be greeted with fresh baked cookies & milk. During your stay you will enjoy a wonderful free breakfast buffet daily, and be able to relax in the evenings with a glass of wine and hors d’oeuvres (M-Th) in our gracious lobby. The Country Inn & Suites offers a cozy stay at a comfortable price.
